tool_description: Convert your food measurement units into grams, oz, lbs, milliliters, cups, teaspoons, tablespoons, fl_oz, liters, quarts, and pints.
name: Food unit of measurement converter
title: Food unit of measurement converter

api_list.name: ingredients
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-unit-of-measurement-converter.p.rapidapi.com/ingredients"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-unit-of-measurement-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://food-unit-of-measurement-converter.p.rapidapi.com/ingredients"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-unit-of-measurement-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: convert
api_list.description: Returns a json containing all units of measurement

required_parameters.name: ingredient
required_parameters.description: One of the available ingredients in /ingredients. Example: `whole_wheat_flour`
